title: CPHI Barcelona 2023: forging collaborations for a promising future in the pharmaceutical sector - Chemistry World
summary: CPHI Barcelona, the global pharmaceutical event, will take place October 24-26, 2023. The event will showcase the latest innovations and developments in the pharmaceutical industry and provide opportunities for networking and collaboration. A new Start-Up Market will feature start-ups, innovators, and small enterprises exhibiting their latest products and solutions.
greenwashing: There is no indication in the article that the event or its products or processes are examples of greenwashing.

summary: The beauty industry is a rapidly growing and competitive market with increasing consumer demand for sustainable and natural products. title: Aveda anticipates 'unlimited potential and growth' in Vietnam - CosmeticsDesign-Asia.com
summary: Aveda, an Est√©e Lauder-owned brand, has launched in Vietnam across multiple channels, including brick-and-mortar retail, e-commerce, and the professional salon channel. The brand aims to become the top omnichannel luxury hair care brand in Vietnam, and is partnering with Singapore-based omnichannel distributor LUXASIA for its entry into the market. Aveda's eco-credentials and focus on sustainability resonate with the modern Vietnamese consumer, and the brand sees huge potential for growth in the country's luxury hair care segment.
green_innovation: TRUE, Aveda's focus on sustainability and use of natural ingredients and processes in its products and services can be considered a green innovation.
business_innovation: TRUE, Aveda's new holistic salon experience, which uses essential oils and sprays to elevate basic cut-and-colour sessions to a luxury hair pampering experience, can be considered a business innovation.
green_product: TRUE, Aveda's products are designed to be environmentally friendly and sustainable, using natural ingredients and processes.
green_process: TRUE, Aveda's use of essential oils, sprays, and massages, even teas prepared for the guests, in its salon experience can be considered a green process.
